cd stevepro
go test


go get -u github.com/onsi/ginkgo/ginkgo
go get -u github.com/onsi/gomega/...


cd adder
ginkgo bootstrap
adder_suite_test.go

ginkgo generate
adder_test.go
adder.go

ginkgo
